Black_Rot.name: Apple Black Rot
Black_Rot.cause: Fungal disease caused by Diplodia seriata.
Black_Rot.prevention: Prune infected branches, clean fallen leaves, and apply fungicides.
Black_Rot.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Bordeaux mixture, Garlic extract.

Cedar_Rust.name: Cedar Apple Rust
Cedar_Rust.cause: Fungal disease caused by Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae.
Cedar_Rust.prevention: Remove cedar trees near apple orchards and apply fungicides.
Cedar_Rust.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Copper-based fungicides, Sulfur spray.

Scab.name: Apple Scab
Scab.cause: Fungal disease caused by Venturia inaequalis.
Scab.prevention: Use resistant varieties, remove infected leaves, and apply fungicides.
Scab.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Baking soda spray, Bordeaux mixture.
